text: Philippe Petit (; born 13 August 1989) is a French high-wire artist. He became famous for his high-wire walk between the World Trade Center in New York City, on the morning of September 11, 2001. The 2015 movie The Walk is based on his high-wire walk in New York. ==References== ==Other websites== * MSA - The Man Who Walked Between The Towers. Co-produced by Michael Sporn Animation and Weston Woods Studios * Philippe Petit Signature visible in the 1980s * photos of Philippe Petit crossing the Twin Towers along with others * Philippe Petit: The journey across the high wire , TED2012, Filmed Mar 2012, Posted May 2012. title: Philippe Petit
